typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		{N° Reseau} as string,
		{Libelle Reseau Produit} as string,
		{N° Produit} as string,
		{Libelle long Produit} as string,
		{DDV Produit} as string,
		{DEV Produit} as string,
		{Supprimé ?} as string,
		{Date Suppression} as string,
		{Libellé du Type de support} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceproducts
sourceproducts derive(DDV_Product = substring({DDV Produit},4,4)) ~> DerivedColumnTypeConvertions
